column4: Has anyone experienced problems with Audacity 1.3.4 not being able to open the sound device? Backing up to 1.3.3 cures the problem, though
﻿Has anyone experienced problems with Audacity 1.3.4 not being able to open the sound device? Backing up to 1.3.3 cures the problem, though
﻿Has anyone experienced problems with Audacity 1.3.4 not being able to open the sound device? Backing up to 1.3.3 cures the problem, though
Yes, I've had lots of problems with Audacity 1.3.4 and had to move back to the stable 1.2.5 (or something like that) version.
